message: I propose a fair split, 90% for me and 10% for you.  Let's get this over with quickly!
Alice, let's be real. That first offer was ridiculous. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take it or leave it, but the pot shrinks for both of us the longer we play.
I'm still not happy with that 70/30 split. I'm willing to give you 40% this time, but it's my final offer. Let's not keep dragging this out.
